sections.heading: 7. HOW LONG WE KEEP YOUR DATA
sections.text:

| Data Category | Retention Period | Reason |
|----------------|------------------|--------|

| [CATEGORY_2] | [PERIOD] | [Reason] |
| [CATEGORY_3] | [PERIOD] | [Reason] |

After the retention period, we will securely delete or anonymize your data.

sections.heading: 8. YOUR RIGHTS
sections.text:
Under UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018, you have the following rights:

1. Right of access (Art 15): Request a copy of your personal data
2. Right to rectification (Art 16): Correct inaccurate data
3. Right to erasure (Art 17): Request deletion in certain circumstances
4. Right to restrict processing (Art 18): Limit how we use your data
5. Right to data portability (Art 20): Receive your data in a structured format
6. Right to object (Art 21): Object to processing based on legitimate interests or for marketing
7. Rights related to automated decision-making (Art 22): Not be subject to solely automated decisions with significant effects

[NEW 2025: Rights under Data (Use and Access) Act 2024:
- Right to access your data through authorized smart data schemes
- Right to control how your data is shared with third parties]

To exercise your rights, contact [DATA_PROTECTION_EMAIL].

You also have the right to complain to the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO):
- Website: ico.org.uk
- Helpline: 0303 123 1113
- Address: Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire SK9 5AF
